name: ElevenLabs
description:
ElevenLabs is a leading AI-powered voice synthesis platform built for creators, studios and businesses that need lifelike audio. It uses advanced deep-learning models to generate expressive, natural-sounding speech in dozens of languages.

With real-time responsiveness, emotional control and industry-leading voice cloning, ElevenLabs has become a go-to solution for podcasters, filmmakers, game studios and educators seeking high-quality narration without recording equipment.

The platform combines accessibility with professional fidelity, offering beginner-friendly browser tools alongside a powerful API for developers.
subtitle: AI voice and speech synthesis for creators.
features: Realistic voice generation with human-like timbre
Emotion-controlled speech synthesis
Custom voice cloning
Automatic dubbing & multilingual support
Browser-based editor

use_cases.title: Podcast Production
use_cases.description: Creators can generate narrations, intros, ads, or full episodes using natural-sounding voices. ElevenLabs helps speed up workflow and reduce costly studio sessions.

use_cases.title: Video Narration & YouTube
use_cases.description: YouTubers can produce high-quality narration in multiple voices and languages, enabling faster content creation and consistency without needing to record audio manually.

use_cases.title: Character Voices for Games
use_cases.description: Indie and professional game developers can quickly prototype characters using unique AI-generated voice profiles, complete with emotions and dynamic tone.

pricing: Free plan available — paid plans start at $5/mo

name: Adobe Podcast
description:
Adobe Podcast is an AI-powered audio platform that helps anyone create clean, clear and professional-sounding voice recordings. Even if you only have a laptop microphone, its tools automatically remove background noise, fix unclear speech and improve overall clarity so your audio sounds polished.

The platform focuses on simplicity. Instead of using a complex timeline, you can edit your audio through a text transcript, which makes it easy to remove mistakes or rearrange content. Features like automatic volume leveling, remote guest recording and smart cleanup tools help creators save time and avoid the frustrations of traditional audio editing.

Adobe Podcast is ideal for podcasters, educators, marketers and anyone who needs high quality voice content without expensive studio gear. Whether you are recording interviews, lessons or voiceovers, the platform helps you sound confident and professional with minimal effort.
subtitle: AI-enhanced audio cleanup and podcast production tools.
features: AI speech enhancement for studio-quality audio
Noise reduction, echo removal & leveling
Transcript-based editing workflow
Automatic clip detection & cleanup
Browser-based recording studio

use_cases.title: Podcast Editing
use_cases.description: Creators can remove background noise, clean up poorly recorded audio and edit episodes using the text-based editor to save hours of manual work.

use_cases.title: Remote Interviews
use_cases.description: Hosts can record high-quality audio from guests anywhere and apply AI enhancement to ensure consistent sound across all voices.

use_cases.title: Marketing & Business Audio
use_cases.description: Teams can generate clean voiceovers for ads, tutorials and corporate content without needing professional studio equipment.

pricing: Included with Adobe Creative Cloud — Enhance Speech has a free tier.

name: Cleanvoice AI
description:
Cleanvoice AI is designed to clean up voice recordings quickly and automatically, which makes it perfect for creators who want smooth and professional audio without learning complicated editing tools. The platform removes filler words like “um” and “uh”, takes out mouth noises, reduces background sounds and smooths over awkward silences so your recordings feel natural and polished.

The tool is especially helpful for people who speak freely on camera or in podcasts. Instead of spending hours removing small mistakes by hand, Cleanvoice does the work for you, making the editing process fast and stress free. You simply upload your audio and receive a cleaner version ready for publishing.

Cleanvoice is a great fit for podcasters, YouTubers, interviewers and educators who want clear voice content that is easy to listen to. It helps your message stand out by removing distractions and delivering a crisp final result.
subtitle: Automatic audio cleanup powered by AI.
features: Automatic filler word removal
Mouth noise detection & cleanup
Stutter & repetition removal
Background noise reduction
Multilingual support

use_cases.title: Podcast Post-Production
use_cases.description: Speeds up editing by automatically removing ums, ahs, lip smacks and awkward pauses for a professional, smooth final cut.

use_cases.title: Voiceover Optimization
use_cases.description: Creators can polish narration for YouTube, audiobooks, or corporate training without manual audio engineering.

use_cases.title: Interview Cleanup
use_cases.description: Multi-speaker recordings become clearer by eliminating distractions such as background noise or verbal tics.

pricing: Pay-as-you-go and subscription plans available from €10/month.

name: Resemble AI
description:
Resemble AI helps creators and businesses generate realistic synthetic voices that can express emotion and speak in multiple languages. The platform allows you to clone your own voice or create entirely new voice profiles that sound natural and engaging, which makes it ideal for storytelling, branding and interactive applications.

Resemble keeps the process simple. Users can upload a small set of recordings or choose from existing voice styles, then type or upload text to instantly generate lifelike speech. The voices can be calm, energetic, dramatic or anything in between, depending on the tone you choose.

The tool is a strong option for studios, game developers, marketers and creators who want unique and expressive voice content without relying on constant manual recording. Whether you are building characters, producing ads or designing an AI assistant, Resemble AI makes it easy to bring your audio to life.
subtitle: Custom voice cloning and AI speech generation.
features: Custom voice cloning
Emotion-driven speech generation
Instant voice conversion
Multilingual & cross-language support
Secure enterprise voice models

use_cases.title: Brand Voice Development
use_cases.description: Companies can create consistent, recognizable synthetic voices for advertisements, virtual agents, and branded experiences.

use_cases.title: Character Voice Creation
use_cases.description: Game studios and filmmakers generate unique voices for characters without hiring multiple voice actors.

use_cases.title: AI Assistants & IVR Systems
use_cases.description: Businesses enhance customer support systems with expressive, natural-sounding automated voices.

pricing: Usage-based pricing with custom enterprise plans.

name: Podcastle AI
description:
Podcastle AI is an all-in-one platform for creating, editing and publishing podcasts without needing advanced audio skills. The platform offers high quality recording tools, AI voice cleanup, easy multitrack editing and natural text-to-speech voices, which means anyone can produce a full podcast episode straight from their browser.

One of its biggest strengths is simplicity. Podcastle lets you record guests remotely, edit audio by modifying the transcript and enhance your voice automatically with built-in AI tools. This helps creators focus on storytelling without worrying about complicated software or equipment.

Podcastle is perfect for beginners and professionals who want an organised workflow for interviews, solo episodes or scripted content. With its mix of easy editing tools and powerful AI features, it helps you produce consistent, polished audio every time.
subtitle: All-in-one AI platform for podcast creation.
features: AI-powered audio enhancement
Multitrack recording & editing
Auto-transcription
Remote interview recording
High-quality text-to-speech voices

use_cases.title: Podcast Recording
use_cases.description: Record clear audio locally or remotely with guest links and then enhance the quality using built-in AI tools.

use_cases.title: Script-to-Audio Production
use_cases.description: Convert written scripts into natural-sounding AI narration for episodes, intros or ads.

use_cases.title: Transcript Editing
use_cases.description: Edit your podcast by modifying the transcript — changes automatically update the audio timeline.

pricing: Free plan available — paid plans start at $14.99/month.

name: ChatGPT
description:
ChatGPT is an AI assistant that helps people write, learn, brainstorm and solve problems through natural conversation. It can explain ideas clearly, generate content in many different styles and help users think through tasks step by step. Whether you are working on a school project, planning a trip or writing a piece of content, ChatGPT is designed to make the process easier.

The tool is also helpful for developers and learners. It can write code, fix errors and explain programming concepts in simple terms, which makes it a helpful companion for both beginners and experienced professionals. ChatGPT can break down complex topics into easy explanations and provide examples to help you understand new skills.

Many people use ChatGPT for everyday tasks like drafting emails, summarising documents or coming up with ideas for creative projects. It is flexible, friendly and designed to support anyone who wants to work faster and understand things more clearly.
subtitle: AI assistant for writing, coding, learning and creativity.
features: Context-aware natural language conversations
Code generation & debugging
Long-form writing & content creation
Data analysis & reasoning
Image generation (with multimodal models)

use_cases.title: Writing & Editing
use_cases.description: Draft emails, essays, articles or scripts with AI-assisted phrasing, idea generation and proofreading.

use_cases.title: Coding Assistance
use_cases.description: Generate functions, fix errors, explain code concepts or build small applications in multiple languages.

use_cases.title: Learning & Research
use_cases.description: Get step-by-step explanations, study help, summaries and insights across academic subjects.

pricing: Free version available — paid plans start at $20/month.

name: Google Gemini
description:
Google Gemini is a smart AI assistant that can understand text, images and ideas to help you work more efficiently. It is designed to handle a wide range of everyday tasks, from answering questions and explaining concepts to helping with writing and generating creative ideas. Because it connects with the Google ecosystem, it can support schoolwork, research and planning in a simple and intuitive way.

Gemini also includes helpful tools for developers and problem solvers. It can write code, suggest improvements and walk you through technical topics in clear language. People who need support with data or documents can use Gemini to analyse content, uncover insights and break down information into easy-to-understand summaries.

Whether you are creating content, studying for exams or exploring new ideas, Google Gemini provides a flexible and friendly experience that helps you work faster and think more clearly. Its multimodal design makes it a useful assistant for both everyday tasks and more complex projects.
subtitle: Google’s multimodal AI for productivity and creativity.
features: Multimodal understanding (text, images, audio)
Advanced reasoning and problem-solving
Code generation & debugging
Google Workspace integration
Real-time internet-backed search

use_cases.title: Data & Research Assistance
use_cases.description: Summarizes sources, analyzes data, and explains complex concepts using multimodal context.

use_cases.title: Coding & App Prototyping
use_cases.description: Helps developers build scripts, fix bugs and design prototypes faster across multiple languages.

use_cases.title: Content & Creative Writing
use_cases.description: Generates stories, posts, marketing copy and brainstorming ideas adapted to user tone.

pricing: Free plan available — Gemini Advanced subscription from $19.99/month.

information.label: API
information.value: Gemini API available via Google AI Studio

name: Meta AI
description:
Meta AI is a conversational assistant built into popular Meta platforms, which makes it easy for people to get help while browsing or chatting with friends. It can answer questions, explain topics, help with writing and generate creative ideas, all in a simple and approachable way. Because it is integrated into apps people already use, Meta AI is accessible at any moment without needing special tools.

The assistant can also create images and help brainstorm content, making it popular with social media users who want to design posts, captions or messages quickly. For learners, Meta AI provides step-by-step explanations and clear answers that make new topics easier to understand.

Meta AI is a convenient choice for anyone who wants quick support while messaging, posting or exploring ideas. It is designed to help improve conversations and make everyday tasks feel smoother and more enjoyable.
subtitle: Conversational assistant available across Meta platforms.
features: Real-time conversational interaction
Image generation with Meta’s models
Writing & creative brainstorming
Integrated search responses
Messenger and Instagram built-in access

use_cases.title: Everyday Q&A
use_cases.description: Ask for definitions, advice, explanations or quick knowledge without searching manually.

use_cases.title: Content Creation
use_cases.description: Generate posts, captions, messages and creative writing instantly.

use_cases.title: Learning & Tutoring
use_cases.description: Get help with homework, concepts or step-by-step explanations inside social apps.

pricing: Free for Meta platform users.

name: Perplexity
description:
Perplexity is an AI search assistant that helps people find accurate information quickly and understand it clearly. Instead of giving long lists of links, Perplexity reads online sources for you and then provides a simple answer with citations. This makes it especially useful for people who want trustworthy information without spending time digging through pages.

The platform is designed to make research easy for everyone. You can ask questions in everyday language and Perplexity will summarise the most important points, highlight key facts and show where the information came from. Students, professionals and curious learners enjoy how fast and clear the answers are.

Perplexity is ideal for anyone who needs a reliable way to explore new topics, check facts or learn quickly. Its mix of accuracy and simplicity makes it an excellent tool for studying, researching or understanding subjects at a deeper level.
subtitle: AI-powered search assistant with real-time citations.
features: Real-time web search with citations
Concise AI summarization
Deep research mode
Document analysis & uploads
Follow-up conversational queries

use_cases.title: Research Summaries
use_cases.description: Find accurate, up-to-date answers with clear citations pulled directly from trusted sources.

use_cases.title: Academic Work
use_cases.description: Students and researchers can analyze documents, extract insights and understand complex topics faster.

use_cases.title: Market & Industry Analysis
use_cases.description: Professionals can get high-level breakdowns of trends, companies or technologies with sourced data.

pricing: Free plan available — Perplexity Pro starts at $20/month.

name: Claude
description:
Claude is an AI assistant created to help people write, think and analyse information with confidence. It is known for producing clear and thoughtful responses, which makes it helpful for writing projects, detailed explanations and everyday problem solving. Claude can handle complex tasks but always communicates in a simple and human-friendly way.

The assistant is also useful for professionals and students who work with long documents. Claude can read large amounts of text, summarise the key ideas and help you understand the information more easily. Developers can use Claude to generate code, review logic and explore technical topics with clear explanations.

Claude is a strong choice for anyone who values accuracy and careful reasoning. It supports writing, planning, creativity and critical thinking, which makes it a reliable partner for both personal and professional tasks.
subtitle: Safe, reliable AI assistant for writing and reasoning.
features: Large context window for long documents
Advanced reasoning & safety features
Coding assistance
Professional writing & editing
Document summarization & interpretation

use_cases.title: Professional Writing
use_cases.description: Create polished reports, articles, business plans and structured documents with clarity and precision.

use_cases.title: Complex Analysis
use_cases.description: Claude can evaluate long documents, contracts or datasets and deliver accurate structured insights.

use_cases.title: Code Help
use_cases.description: Generate functions, fix bugs and explain logic with safe, structured reasoning.

pricing: Free version available — Claude Pro starts at $20/month.

name: Codex AI
description:
Codex AI is designed to help people write code by turning everyday language into working programs. You can describe what you want to build and Codex will generate the code, explain how it works and suggest improvements. This makes it a helpful tool for beginners learning to program and for developers who want to work more efficiently.

The platform can also assist with debugging. If something is not working, you can paste your code into Codex and receive clear guidance on what went wrong and how to fix it. It supports many popular programming languages, which makes it flexible for different projects and skill levels.

Codex is a great partner for building small tools, learning programming or speeding up development tasks. It reduces the time spent on repetitive work and helps users focus on the creative and problem solving parts of coding.
subtitle: AI model that converts natural language into code.
features: Natural language → code generation
Code explanation & debugging
Multi-language support
Unit test generation
API-ready model integration

use_cases.title: Accelerated Development
use_cases.description: Write functions or small modules faster by describing the logic in plain language.

use_cases.title: Code Learning
use_cases.description: Beginners can ask for explanations, examples and clarifications across many programming languages.

use_cases.title: Automated Testing
use_cases.description: Codex can generate test cases and basic QA coverage to support engineering workflows.

pricing: Pay-as-you-go via OpenAI API.

name: Qodo
description:
Qodo is an AI tool that helps developers create strong and reliable software by generating intelligent test cases and reviewing code for potential issues. It looks for mistakes and weaknesses that are easy to overlook, then provides clear suggestions that help improve the overall quality of your project.

The platform works smoothly within common development workflows. You can send Qodo a piece of code and receive readable feedback that highlights risks and offers safer alternatives. It is especially useful for teams that want to increase test coverage or maintain consistent code standards without spending hours writing tests by hand.

Qodo is ideal for developers who want clean, dependable code and a faster testing process. It gives you confidence in your work and helps you catch issues early so your software stays stable and efficient.
subtitle: AI tool for automated test generation and code quality.
features: Automated test case generation
Static code analysis
Bug detection & suggestions
Language-agnostic support
IDE & CI/CD integration

use_cases.title: Test Creation
use_cases.description: Automatically generate test cases to improve coverage and reduce manual QA workloads.

use_cases.title: Code Review Assistance
use_cases.description: Identify risks, logic issues and potential bugs early in the development cycle.

use_cases.title: Continuous Integration Quality
use_cases.description: Integrate Qodo into pipelines to enforce consistent code quality standards.

pricing: Professional and enterprise plans available.

name: Stitch
description:
Stitch is an AI tool that helps developers and designers work together by turning natural language ideas into real code and interactive prototypes. Instead of switching between multiple tools or struggling to translate design concepts into working software, users can describe what they want and Stitch helps generate the structure, layout and logic.

The platform is built to support collaboration. Designers can share their ideas in simple language and developers can quickly turn those ideas into early versions of apps or websites. This speeds up the entire workflow because teams spend less time explaining concepts and more time building.

Stitch is ideal for early stage prototyping, design handoffs and rapid development. It gives teams a faster and clearer way to move from idea to execution, which makes it helpful for startups, product teams and students learning to build projects.
subtitle: Google’s AI tool for turning ideas into UI and frontend code.
features: Generate multi-screen web and mobile UIs from natural language prompts
Accepts image, sketch or wireframe references to guide layout and style
Exports responsive front-end code for faster developer handoff
Supports multiple variants to explore different layouts, themes and flows
Browser-based Google Labs experiment with tight design–dev feedback loop

use_cases.title: Rapid Product UI Prototyping
use_cases.description: Turn early-stage product ideas into concrete interface concepts in minutes instead of days, exploring different layouts and flows without manually redrawing screens.

use_cases.title: Design-to-Development Handoff
use_cases.description: Generate structured front-end code that developers can refine instead of rebuilding UIs from scratch, reducing miscommunication between design mocks and implementation.

use_cases.title: Exploring Alternative Design Directions
use_cases.description: Use prompts and reference images to explore multiple design directions quickly, helping teams compare options for visual style, hierarchy and UX before committing.

name: Blackbox AI
description:
Blackbox AI is a coding assistant that helps developers search, understand and write code more efficiently. It looks across projects and repositories to find examples that match what the user needs, then explains how the code works in simple terms. This makes it useful for learning new frameworks and solving problems without spending hours online searching for answers.

The tool also supports instant code generation. Users can ask Blackbox to write functions, fix errors or translate code between languages. It provides clean and readable snippets that developers can use as a starting point, which speeds up development and reduces repetitive work.

Blackbox AI is helpful for beginners who need clear explanations and for experienced developers who want to improve productivity. It simplifies debugging, documentation and everyday coding tasks so users can focus on building real features.
subtitle: Multi-agent AI coding assistant for search, completion and automation.
features: Real-time code autocompletion and generation across major languages and frameworks
Semantic code search across files, repositories and even code shown in videos
Multi-agent coding workflows for refactoring, documentation and feature implementation
Integrations with popular IDEs and CLIs for in-context assistance
Unified API to access top LLMs and generative models through a single endpoint

name: DeepSite
description:
DeepSite is an AI tool that turns text prompts into real websites or interactive layouts, which makes it easy for anyone to create a web presence without advanced design or coding knowledge. Users can describe the type of website they want and DeepSite generates a responsive design that works across devices.

The platform also helps with early stage prototyping. Creators can test ideas quickly by generating multiple layouts, editing content and refining the style through simple instructions. This allows users to explore different directions without needing to build each version manually.

DeepSite is ideal for entrepreneurs, students, small businesses and designers who want a simple way to move from concept to a working visual. It removes technical barriers and lets users focus on their ideas rather than the code behind them.
subtitle: Open-source AI tool that turns prompts into live, editable websites.
features: Generate live, runnable web pages from short natural language briefs
Produces readable HTML, CSS and JavaScript that can be exported or extended
Supports iterative refinement so you can adjust sections, components or styles via prompts

name: Midjourney
description:
Midjourney is an AI image generator known for creating artistic and expressive visuals from short text prompts. It produces images with strong style, rich detail and emotional impact, which makes it a favorite among designers, storytellers and creative professionals.

The platform encourages exploration and creativity. Users can experiment with different styles, moods and compositions to develop concepts for characters, environments or branding. This makes Midjourney helpful for people who want to visualise ideas before moving into full production.

Midjourney is ideal for artists, writers, marketers and studios that want unique visuals for campaigns, concept art or storytelling. It turns imagination into vivid artwork with very little effort, even for users who have no design background.

name: DALL-E 3
description:
DALL-E 3 is an AI model that creates detailed and accurate images based on everyday language descriptions. It understands context well, which allows it to generate images that match your prompt closely, including characters, objects and scenes with clear structure and consistency.

The model is designed to be easy for beginners. Users can describe what they want in natural language and DALL-E 3 handles the rest, producing illustrations, product mockups, educational diagrams or creative artwork. This makes it a flexible tool that supports both practical and artistic needs.

DALL-E 3 is helpful for designers, teachers, marketers and creators who need fast and reliable visuals. It simplifies the creative process and allows anyone to turn written ideas into polished images without needing drawing or design skills.

name: Canva
description:
Canva combines a simple design interface with AI features that help users create professional visuals quickly. Its tools support everything from social media graphics to presentations and the built-in AI can generate images, suggest layouts and adjust designs automatically to fit your project.

The platform is designed for non-designers, which means you can drag, drop and customise elements without any experience. AI features help refine your design, choose colors, fix spacing and create content that looks clean and modern. Canva also offers thousands of templates that users can personalise in minutes.

Canva is ideal for small business owners, marketers, teachers and students who want polished graphics without hiring a designer. It brings professional design capabilities to everyone and saves time on creative tasks that would otherwise be complicated.

name: Playground
description:
Playground is a creative environment where users can experiment with text-to-image and language generation models. It is designed to encourage exploration, letting users try different styles, ideas and prompts to see how AI responds. This makes it a fun and flexible tool for learning how generative AI works.

The platform supports both visual and written creativity. Users can generate artwork, write stories, test prompts or combine different models for unique results. Because everything updates instantly, Playground helps users understand how small changes in wording can produce very different outcomes.

Playground is great for artists, developers and curious users who want a place to test ideas freely. It offers a safe and inspiring space for experimentation, prototyping and creative growth.

name: Leonardo
description:
Leonardo is an AI image generator designed for creating high quality game assets, illustrations and digital art. It focuses on style consistency, which makes it especially helpful for studios and designers who need multiple images that match the same look and feel.

Users can train custom models, upload references and refine images through simple instructions. This allows artists to generate characters, textures and environments that maintain continuity across a full project. It also speeds up early concept work before moving into detailed production.

Leonardo is popular among game developers, illustrators and creative teams who want fast, reliable and cohesive visuals. It provides a powerful mix of quality and control that helps bring imaginative worlds to life.
subtitle: AI image and video generation platform built for consistent, production-ready assets.
features: Multiple image and video models with style presets for different aesthetics
Token-based generation with daily or monthly allowances depending on plan
Custom model training and fine-tuning for brand- or project-specific styles
Tools for upscaling, background removal and batch asset creation

QuillBot is useful for academic writing, emails, business documents and creative projects. It helps users communicate clearly, avoid repetition and refine their voice so the final result reads smoothly and professionally.

name: Emergent
description:
Emergent is an AI platform that integrates tools for coding, planning and team automation, helping developers streamline workflows.

It can assist with writing and reviewing code, generating tasks, coordinating work and connecting with other tools in the stack.

This makes it useful for teams that want an AI layer over their development and project processes.
subtitle: AI copilot for coding, planning and automating team workflows.
features: AI-assisted coding and code explanation capabilities
Task generation and planning support for projects
Workflows that connect to external tools and APIs
Collaborative environment for teams to coordinate work with AI help
Focus on automating repetitive development and ops tasks

use_cases.title: Developer Productivity
use_cases.description: Engineers offload routine coding, refactoring and documentation tasks to Emergent.

use_cases.title: Project Planning & Coordination
use_cases.description: Teams use AI to break down features into tasks and keep track of progress across tools.

use_cases.title: Automation of Repetitive Work
use_cases.description: Ops and dev teams automate recurring workflows like deployments, checks and synchronisation.

pricing: Likely subscription-based; details available via the platform.

information.label: Type
information.value: AI assistant and automation platform for development teams

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Works with code and project data; provides security and privacy documentation

information.label: API
